author: Simon Difford
description: A Daiquiri-like cocktail made in the style of a Caipirinha.
name: Caipirissima
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE lime wedges in the base of shaker to release juice and oils in its skin
SHAKE with 6oz scoop crushed ice and pour all without straining into glass
